inn1.comm: starts with a full delivery outside off, he drags it wide of mid-on for a single to kick things off, Guptill off the mark
slanting down the pads, called a wide, some swing for Zaheer but that was misdirected

edged and gone! Good length outside off and moves away just a hint, McCullum pokes at it, fatally, gets a thick outside edge straight to Vijay at second slip, poor return from injury for the man, almost guided it to Vijay there
swing again, but another wide down the leg side
bowled fullish on the off, driving length, opts to defend it solidly into the off side
some swing into the batsman, clips the pads on the way to the keeper
moving in from a good length on the off, defended with a straight bat down the pitch
swing again, fullish, a tempting length outside off, shoulders arms to the keeper
swing for Nehra again, coming into the batsman, caught on the pads as he tries to play it into the leg side, would have gone down
some swing again, fullish outside off, shoulders arms to leave it be
swing again and he had moved across, turned the face to play it into the leg side for a single

nipped back in and caught him on the pads, big appeal for lbw, opted to play that short of a good length ball off the back foot, struck high on the pads though in line, height was the question and the umpire said not out
goodish lenght, steps forward and defends it to cover
wide, the third for Zaheer, swings away this time and the batsman doesn't bother chasing it
short of a good length on middle, squared him up a little, rocked back and tapped it into the off side
front and across and caught on the pads again, getting it to move back in, a potentially lethal delivery but he got an inside edge as he fell over
straying in line this time, on the pads and they manage to squeeze out a legbye

big appeal for lbw, looked out on first sight, swinging in, he's across the line and tries to play it into the leg side, struck on the pads and that was plumb, would have gone on to hit middle and leg, umpire Tarapore doesn't think so, Zaheer should have had him there, the bat hitting the pad might have led the umpire to think there was an inside edge
drops it close to the stumps on the off side and races for a single
short of a good length on the off, knocks it down in front of point
fullish on the off, defended with a stretch into the off side
around a good length on the off, pushes it towards cover
pitched up on the off, driven towards mid-off, showing the full face
nipping back in from  agood length on the off, defended solidly to mid-off
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and punches it to mid-on
short of a good length outside off, punched towards mid-off on the back foot
short outside off, there to pull and he goes for it, mistimes it but manages to earn a boundary, pulled it over mid-on, almost came off the bottom of the bat
good length ball on the off, defends it into the off side with bat close to pad
that's dismissed, good length just outside off and he swings it hard and mighty into the stands for a massive six, came off the meat and was flat, a crowd killer

run-out, Guptill has to go, pushed firmly down the ground past the bowler to mid-on, Gambhir at mid-on picks it up and throws down the stumps at the non-striker's end, Guptill dives but is well short of the crease, India have struck again
angling in, just wide of off stump, appears to hold its line, leaves it be
short of a good length on middle, gets back and defends it into the leg side
full outside off, gets across and pushes it to mid-on for a quick single
ooh, gets an inside edge just as he tries to shoulder arms, almost dragged it onto the stumps, he's already survived a a close lbw call
time for his favourite back-foot punch, short of a good lenght, eases it between point and cover for a couple of runs
beaten, defends inside the line, good length and draws him forward, holds its line and just escapes the outside edge
just a fraction outside off, opens the face to guide it past point for a single
good length ball outside off, defended confidently to cover
driving length, restrains himself and opts to leave it alone
good length outside off, holding its line, shoulders arms again to let it be
fullish on the off, driven with a full face back to the bowler
teasing line outside off and Williamson wisely decides to let it go
shortish, gets back and punches it towards mid-on, no run available there
short of a good length on middle, gets on the back foot and defends it into the leg side
length ball on the off, stabbed away into the off side towards cover
takes it from the stumps and rolls it down towards fine leg for a single
good carry to the keeper, pushes at it loosely and is beaten by the away movement, just past the outside edge

played it well though Nehra would have sensed a chance of trapping him in front, some swing there, came back in but Williamson covered with a shuffle and drove it elegantly through mid-on and midwicket
a much better delivery, much fuller, targeting the lbw again and with swing again, but Williamson flicks that through square leg for two more
short of a good length and moves away, there to cut and he chases it, misses
good length ball is driven well towards mid-on off the front foot but straight to the fielder
around a good length on the off, gets back and defends it towards extra cover
short outside off, chopped straight to point
short of a good length outside off, mistimes a cut to cover
much closer to the stumps this time, Taylor gets back and defends it cautiously back to the bowler
on middle and leg, moves across and works it away off his hips to fine leg for a couple of runs
short of a good length on the off, gets nicely behind it and defends it to cover
rocks on the back foot and punches it back to the bowler
length delivery on middle this time, gets back and works it towards midwicket
just a hint of swing now, into the batsman, covers it well, moves across slightly, and defends it to mid-off
back of a length, stands tall and punches it straight to extra cover
turns the face and works it towards square leg
short of a good length on the off, gets across and defends it to cover
gets well across, the delivery holds its line, turns it wide of mid-on for a single, Gambhir runs across and keeps them to one
aiming for the legcutter, moved just a little away, Taylor came across to play it into the leg side, ended up getting a leading edge towards mid-off

gone! Big appeal, and it's upheld. Lands on a good length and Taylor, quote subdued until now, decides to expand, trying to drive it on the up through the covers, gets a faint inside edge straight to Saha, no doubts about that one, Zaheer has struck again

big appeal for lbw, did it pitch outside leg? That's probably the reason why it was not given, struck the batsman in line with middle and off as he moved across to drive it through the leg side, struck in line but could have pitched outside leg, lets look at the replays in a bit. It didn't pitch outside leg at all, in fact it pitched on leg and struck him in front of middle. Was there an inside edge? Didn't look like it. Tarapore suggested it pitched outside leg, but it didn't. Styris is lucky
pushed into the off side
fullish outside off, driven towards extra cover
lands on a good length on the off, dabs it in front of the bowler, thinks of the single but it's not there
fullish on the off, pushed it gently in front of mid-on for a quick single, Nehra took some time to get to it
shoulders arms to hat slightly widish delivery
pushed through to mid-off off the front foot
in the channel outside off, opens the face slightly to run it down to third man for a single
gets across and tries to play it into the leg side, rusty is Styris early on, gets it to cut away, leading edge again, to third man for a single
short outside off and a bit too much width this time, left alone, called a wide
slightly short on the off, punches it off the back foot wide of midwicket for a single
back of a length on the off, rocks back and knocks it down
good length delivery outside off, got an inside edge as he tried to push it through the line, onto the pads
ooh, Styris calls for a run and Williamson sends him back just about the right time, Styris slipped as he tried to make his way back but no damage done
short of a good length outside off, holds its line, leaves it be
good length delivery on the off, knocks it back to the bowler
short of a good length, gets back and pushes it to cover
straight on middle and it's whipped away but straight to midwicket
short ball down the leg side, he mad moved quite across but couldn't get his bat to it, called a wide
lands on a good length on the off, defended soundly back to the bowler
appeal for lbw, appeared to pitch outside leg, came towards middle, rocked on the back foot and was caught on the pads, leg bye, pitched outside leg as the replays confirm
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it to mid-off, can't pierce the field

appalling fielding, Nehra is screaming his guts out, Gambhir picks it at mid-on and aims at the non-striker's end, misses and it would have been out if it had hit. That's not the appalling bit. It's what follows. it's overthrows and Ravindra Jadeja at the point boundary runs across to collect it, misses and allows it to roll over the ropes. Frustration for the bowler.
defended into the leg side
opts to leave it be as it's in the channel outside off
runs it down to third man for a single
shortish on middle, worked away through square leg for a single

given out lbw, swing for Munaf, came back in and Williamson has to go, good length on middle, landed around there, Williamson tried to drive it through the line, missed and it struck him on the back pad, appeared as though it would have struck middle and leg. It's umpire Kettlebrough this time, getting it right, or so it seems. Hit on the back leg, seaming in from just outside off. Dead plumb
gets a wide sighter, well outside off
fuller, closer to off, pushed to mid-off
angled across him, left alone
makes him play, getting some movement in, Franklin drives to mid-on
nearly played on, unsure Franklin pokes at this outside off, the inside edge thuds into his pad
nicely played, lovely shot, punched on the up, between mid-off and extra cover. Shot of the morning so far
pushed to cover-point off the back foot
stays back and pushes this shortish ball to mid-off
slower ball, very well bowled, it's like a vicious offbreak, Styris is nearly done in. The edge falls short of the keeper
another lovely shot through the cover region. This time off the front foot, driving on the rise. Clean connection with an open face
steered to third man
left alone outside off
opens the face on this outside off, gets a single
angled across him, left alone outside off
back of a length, around off, defended back to him
on target, driven back to Munaf who does the fielding in the followthrough
pushed to mid-off off the back foot
whoa! That turned a mile. Styris moved across to this delivery pitched outside off, looking to cover the spin, but this one broke in big time, beating the stumps and the keeper
ah that turns and stops too, Styris defends off the front foot
defended towards midwicket
tossed up wide, covers the line well, and then opens the face for a single
beats him with low bounce as Franklin looks to play away from his body
pushed to cover, playing with the turn
that's the straighter one, angling in from round the stumps, too straight, and worked away for a couple
lands on a good length on middle, worked away to midwicket
worked away through to deep square leg for a single
good length outside off, holds its line, leaves it alone to the keeper
moved across, targeting middle and off, pushes it towards extra cover
standing outside the crease now, fullish on the off, pushed it towards mid-off
pitched up on the pads, driven firmly towards deep midwicket for a single
tosses it up outside off from round the wicket, turned away and he lets it be
hitting the footmarks, too much spin in fact, turned away sharply, taking everyone by surprise
pitched up on the off, pushed back to the bowler
defended uppishly, that one went straight on, towards extra cover
goes to slip, defends it with an open face and with loose hands, falls short
fullish on middle, driven to mid-on, a maiden from the offspinner
back of a length on middle, gets on the back foot and plays it to the bowler
short and wide, slashes hard does Styris and Nehra could have done better in the deep at third man, should have dived to his left but didn't, four more

dropped a sitter, short and wide, Styris pushes at it away from his body, guides it straight to first slip where the home boy Yusuf Pathan spills it on the third attempt, straightforward chance gone down
short of a good length outside off, moves away to beat the outside edge, this is a good over
fullish on the off, driven straight to mid-off
short and wide, cut away down to third man for a single

run-out appeal, turning in from a good length on middle, worked away through square leg, Munaf runs in from deep backward square leg and returns a good throw, the batsman had made it back but was his bat in the air as he dived and tried to slide the bat in? Not quite, though it is tough to say with conviction. The benefit of the doubt goes to the batsman
gets front and across and turns it towards midwicket
much straighter this time, turns the face to play it into the leg side again
fullish on middle, pushed back towards the bowler
looping it on middle and leg, dabs it back down the pitch

good catch by Yuvraj at leg slip, tossed up on middle and leg, Styris, who had struggled to pinch a single for the previous four deliveries, turned the face again to play it fine, and that he did but there was a leg slip in place, Yuvraj was alert there and snapped a sharp, low catch to send back Styris, who had been extremely fortunate to bat for as long as he did
full outside off, driven through the line to mid-off
good length delivery outside off, leaves it alone to the keeper
short of a good length, punches it to mid-off off the back foot
big appeal for lbw, plumb in front but only off the inside edge, straight on middle, gets well across to play it into the leg side but is saved by that faint contact with the bat
on middle and leg, knocked away into the leg side
straying on the leg side, flicked down to fine leg for a rare Franklin single
a boundary for Franklin, straying on the pads from round the wicket, sweeps it hard down to the fine-leg boundary, deep square leg didn't have a chance
nice timing, pitched up outside off, driven sweetly past long-off for two more
stepping up now, Ashwin flights it on middle and off, Franklin reaches forward and sweeps it again, this time in front of square, for another four
tossed up on middle, defended back onto the pitch
much quicker through the air, plays it back to the bowler
shortish on the off, gets on the back foot and taps it into the leg side
short of a good length on middle, gets back and turns it to square leg
good length on the off, taps it just wide of point to race for a single
lands on a length on leg stump, moves across and plays it to midwicket
fullish on middle, driven back to the bowler
beaten, the offcutter, landed on a good length, prompted Franklin to poke at it, beat the outside edge
bowls it again on a good length, defended to mid-off
Vettori employs the sweep now, plays it down to deep square leg for a single
drifting in towards middle, punched in front of deep cover, lots of vacant space and they easily come back for the second
looping it on the off, some turn away from the batsman, guided to point
length delivery on the off, pushed towards extra cover
flighted on the off, driven down the ground to long-off
angling it towards middle and leg, defended to midwicket
shortish on middle and off, punched to extra cover
punched off the back foot to long-off for a single
drags it from outside off to fine leg for a single
shortish outside off, cut away down to deep point for a single
slowed it up through the air, mistimes a cut to point

guided it to slip, quicker through the air, good turn and bounce for Yusuf, Vettori had shaped up to play the cut and just played it to slip where Yuvraj took another sharp one, straight onto his chest
short on leg stump, turned towards middle, worked it down to fine leg
ooh, almost another Styris there, there is a leg slip in place and this one is played just wide of him for a couple of runs, was uppish, but no chance
flighted on the off, driven back to the bowler
100 up with a lovely drive, pitched up and he played it positively, driving it firmly through extra cover for a boundary
turns it toward short leg
waits for it to turn in, gets on the back foot and works it to midwicket
tossed up on the off, driven firmly wide of long-off for a couple of runs
shortish outside off, slapped down to deep cover for a single

another one to leg slip, Yuvraj is having a ball there, on middle and leg, turning further down, Hopkins is hunting for the single, turns the face and it's straight to Yuvraj who takes an easy one this time
worked through square leg to get off the mark
fullish on middle, defended into the off side towards cover
short on the off, punched off the back foot to deep cover
short and down the leg side, turning further down, wide
gets across and turns it down really fine for a couple of runs
would be worth having a leg slip here too, spins down and no contact with the bat this time, just a bye down to fine leg
moves well across does Nathan and defends it solidly back to the bowler
short outside off, slaps it down towards deep cover for a couple of runs
flighted on the off, gets across and plays it past square leg for a single
tossed up, comes down the track and plays it back to the bowler
tries to work it away into the leg side, is struck on the pads
shortish on middle, rocks back and plays it to midwicket
tickled off the pads to square leg for a single
turning away from a good length outside off, leaves it alone
slightly short outside off, turning away, goes for the cut, misses
appeal for lbw, seemed to me that it pitched outside leg, turned in and struck him in line but you can't give those out
flighted on the off, drilled down the ground to long-off for a single
through leg slip, fell short and through Kohli's legs towards fine leg for two more
turning in from a good length on middle, comes down the track and plays it into the leg side
punches it off the back foot to cover
fires it quick from round the wicket on the off, gets back and defends
pushes it through midwicket, slightly uppish, for a single to keep strike
the reverse-sweep is out and it yields four, fullish outside off and he helps it on its way past point for a boundary
turning in just a hint, gets outside off and defends
fires a quickish delivery down the leg side, another wide
stabs it through square for a single
flighted on middle and off, steps forward, opens the face and plays it to point
knocks it down in front of extra cover
waits for it to turn away and it does turn away, leaves it alone
edged and straight to slip but well short, good length and he pushed at it
bowls it short on middle, worked away down to fine leg for a single
short on the off, punched straight to mid-off
much closer to the stumps, played slightly outside the line of the delivery, got an inside edge on the pads
short and wide, edged and wide of slip, slashed hard and evaded Yusuf's reach at first slip, raced to the third man boundary
banged it short on leg stump, ducks under it, a harmless delivery let go
pushed wide of cover for a single

Yusuf is down, pushed it back towards the bowler, Yusuf stretched to defend that, he had to stretch behind the non-striker who had already backed up, was struck on the face by the top of the pad as he dived down, quite a blow that and understandably he's taking a little time to reover, these pads aren't so cushiony anymore
Yusuf is up, and is driven down the ground to long-on
turning towards middle from leg, defended on the pitch
shortish on the off, punched off the back foot to deep cover
much slower through the air, pushed gently past the bowler for one more
opens the face and guides Munaf down to third man for a single
length ball outside off, holds its line, leaves it alone
pitched up and it's struck hard, driven straight to extra cover
short on middle, punched off the back foot to mid-on for a single
pushed with a closed face wide of mid-on for one more
firmly struck, not quite pitched up but he drove it through the line, off the meat to beat that gap between extra cover and mid-off for a boundary
turning in from the off, played it back to the bowler
walks across and flicks it uppishly through square leg for a single
slightly short on the off, dabbed it just wide of midwicket for a single
flighted, comes down the track and drives it down to long-on for a single
went on straight, no turn there, pressed it away just wide of Kohli at extra cover, quick release, but a slightly wayward throw
tucked away wide of Kohli at midwicket for a single, thinks of a second but Kohli has recovered well, doesn't allow it
flighted on middle, driven down to midwicket
angling it on middle, swept down fine for a couple of runs, not sure what Jadeja was appealing for there
gets across and defends it wide of point, calls for a single but Franklin is then sent back, makes it back in time
fires it down the leg side, bonus runs for New Zealand, brushes the pads and rolls down the fine-leg boundary
turning away, knocks it in front of point and calls for a single but Franklin sends him back
straight, moves well across and presents the full face to the bowler
fullish on the off, defended straight to extra cover
pushed straight to extra cover, Kohli does well diving full strentch to his right
short of a good length outside off, chops it down to point
angling in towards off, pushed in front of point for a single to raise the 50-stand, well done
fetches it from outside off and dabs it to midwicket
good, tidy over, flighted on middle, comes down the track and plays it to midwicket
gets back and presses it away to midwicket
full on middle, driven to midwicket again
quicker through the air on the off stump, chops it in front of point for a single
pitches it up on the off, pushes it through the line to long-off
came down the track to work it away to the leg side, couldn't make contact
full on middle, driven straight to long-on for a single
dabs it into the off side, can't quite pierce the field there
angling in from round the wicket, played it to point
too many dot balls, turns away, chops it down to point
flighted on the off, driven through the line back to the bowler, the dot balls keep piling on
pushed wide of point for a single and then there are overthrows as Yusuf and Gambhir both miss the throw
short on middle, knocks it down towards point
guided towards point, no single on offer
went straight on and he played for the turn, struck on the pads but off the inside edge
flighted on the off, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
flat, comes down the track and just plays it back to the bowler
fullish, driven towards long-off for one more
angling in towards middle and then turning towards off, gets back and defends it to midwicket
goes for the sweep and connects well, smacks it towards deep square leg, and Nehra running to his right can't quite reach it, could have made a better effort, 49 is now his highest score
swept away behind square to bring up his half-century, he's led his team's recovery though it's come slowly
gets forward and defends that flattish delivery to cover
bowls the carrom ball, slowed it down, he moved well across and then got a leading edge as he played for the turn
flicked away past square leg for a single to keep strike
slightly short outside off, chops it towards point
reverse-sweep again and it works, there is no one behind point and he finds the gap with ease, it's fired outside off and is dealt with
shortish on the off, moves across and bunts it towards long-on
fires it on the pads, flicked away to deep backward square leg for a single
pushed through midwicket into the deep for a single
low full toss from round the wicket, played wide of midwicket to retain strike
swept hard but straight to deep square leg for a single
saw him come down the track and bowled it down leg, covers it in the end and plays it to deep backward square leg
flighted on the off, driven down towards long-off for a single
fullish on the off, pushed towards a slightly deepish mid-off for one more
slowed it up did Ashwin, turned away, and he went for the short-arm pull, got the top edge but it fell safe
Kohli dives valiantly but can't stop that, short outside off, turning in, slashes hard, gets a thick edge that beats the diving point for a boundary
low full toss outside leg, flicked away to deep square leg
pitched up outside off, makes room and cracks it to extra cover, just the single
lovely, clean hit, pitched up on leg stump and he swings it clean over wide long-on for a meaty six
full toss, clubbed bit on the bounce to deep midwicket for a single, will feel he missed out there
makes room and smacks it to long-off for one more
Jadeja is getting hit, round the wicket and fires it quick on middle, swipes it into that gap between deep midwicket and deep square leg for a boundary
tries tor the reverse-sweep again but can't connect, is struck on the pads
the partnership is broken, makes room, turns in and he tries to smack that over extra cover but doesn't get the desired elevation, straight to Gambhir
tickles it behind square for  a single
tossed up, full on the off, driven to extra cover
short, turns away, punched off the back foot past extra cover
quicker ball but down the leg side
the carrom ball and he gets the leading edge but safe and short in front of short third man
short of a good length outside off, punched wide of Nehra at extra cover
full and wide, makes room and pushes it past cover for a single
attempted yorker, turns out to be a low full toss, driven firm but straight to midwicket
inswinging yorker, tries to pick it over midwicket, gets an inside edge down to fine leg for a single

picked the slower one and clubbed that out of the ground, was short, he shaped up for it and deposited it with a powerful swipe over deep midwicket, over the roof, or as Jeremy Coney put it, over the shamiana
mistimes this one, trying to go over midwicket again, gets a thick inside edge into the leg side for a single
yorker, he made room and Nehra chased him, Mills somehow managed an inside edge and got three runs, past short fine leg where Zaheer gives chase, three leg byes actually, it came off the pads
full outside off, steered just wide of third man for a single
full outside leg stump as he makes room, squeezes it past point for one more
attempted yorker, takes it on the half-volley and strikes it along the ground to long-on for a single
superbly struck, full toss and he smacked it hard, made room and cracked it through extra cover for a boundary
run-out, digs it out wide of long-off and completes the single, calls for the second but Saha takes off the bails with Mills caught short

inn2.comm: edged and past second slip, short of a good length, Vijay moves back and survives a potentially fatal poke outside off
short and wide, there to cut but Gambhir opts to leave it be
short and down the leg side, Gambhir moves across and helps it on its way to the fine-leg boundary, easy pickings
down the leg side again, tries to work it fine, clips the pads on the way to fine leg
short of a good length on middle, rocks back and turns it past square leg for a single
good length outside off, holds its line, shoulders arms to leave it to the keeper
single immediately, shortish outside off, punched off the back foot wide of mid-off for a single
short ball down the leg side, holds its line and it's a wide
shortish outside off, guided it down to third man for a single
short of a good length outside off, shoulders arms to leave it be
a touch wide, short of a good length again, no swing, no movement, straight through to the keeper
back of a length on the off, gets nicely behind it and taps it to mid-off
edged, fuller and prompted vijay to step forward and push at it, got a thick edge and landed just short of second slip
came down the track and he saw him come down, shortish on leg stump, turned away to square leg
lovely shot, a touch too straight, fullish on middle, got across and drove it between mid-on and midwicket for a boundary
back of a length on the off, stands tall and guides it behind point for a single
landed on a good length outside off, a bit of shape away, left alone
square driven, full outside off, steers it past a diving point just wide of third man for a single
back of a length on the off, rocks back and taps it to extra cover
well kept by Hopkins, was sliding down the leg side, dives full length to his left to snap it, wide called
and today he's sliding down leg, on leg stump and moving down, deflects off Vijay's pads down to the fine-leg boundary
full on the pads again, flicked away towards fine leg, didn't get it as fine as he would have liked, just the single
back of a length on the off, rocks back and drops it down in front of point

overthrows, back of a length, drops it in front of point and races for a single, Brendon McCullum picked it up and returned a wayward throw past the stumps at the striker's end, bonus runs for India, though the attempt at a direct hit was right, had it been accurate, Vijay would have been struggling
yorker on middle, dug out in front of midwicket, nicely played in the end
short of a good length on the off, punched to extra cover
short and wide, he gave him the charge and slashed him over point for a boundary wide of third man
easy runs, full on the pads, a gift ball and it's tickled elegantly down to the fine-leg boundary, four more
good length on middle, worked away towards midwicket, there's a fumble and they steal a single
kept a little low and came back in just a hint, missed and it got to the keeper on the bounce
shortish on the off, punched towards extra cover off the back foot
short of a good length on the off, dabs it back onto the pitch
short of a good length on the off, gets on the back foot and punches it past extra cover for a couple of runs
on middle and leg, gets across a little and pushes it towards mid-on
just around the off stump, Gambhir defends it solidly in front of the bowler
straying on the pads, flicked away through square leg for a couple of runs, runs flowing easily for India
quick single, fullish on the off, eased it wide of mid-off for a run to keep strike
beaten as it moved away just a hint, not much but lethal enough, tries to drive it through the line and the movement just ensures it goes past the outside edge
too much width this time, a mistake he committed often in the previous match, caressed it through the covers for another four
sliding on the pads and there's more punishment, flicked away through square leg, overcompensating is McKay and he pays the price
he'll be tearing his head now, errs in line again, too wide this time and it's almost a half-volley, Gambhir just opens the face and steers it past point for a boundary
back of a length on middle, gets back and turns it to midwicket
full outside off, driven straight to extra cover
good length on middle, pushed towards mid-on
full outside off, pushed through the line to mid-off
drilled back to the bowler, pitched up and it's hit hard but Franklin manages to get his boot to it and deflects it to mid-off
good length on middle and off, turned just wide of mid-on for a quick single, he's slightly deep is mid-on and a single was always on

Nathan McCullum in the deep dives valiantly to save a run as Gambhir flicks it through square leg, doesn't quite stop it on the first attempt and just as he dives again to haul it back on the second, his shoulder scrapes the ropes and it's four
India are dominating this, pitched up from Franklin, it's gentle medium, Gambhir confidently walks down the track and pushes him through the line for another four
good length from round the wicket, defended to extra cover
shortish outside off, punched off the back foot to deep cover for a single
angling towards middle and off, turns it past midwicket for a single to raise another half-century, following up on his match-winning knock in the previous game, leading by example
tosses it up, floating it towards middle, content to defend it to extra cover
driven towards midwicket off the front foot
on middle and leg, turns the face and taps it down the leg side
pitched it up on the off, tries to strike him through the line, gets a thick outside edge to third man for a single
Vijay still not very convincing, full outside off, tries to smash him over mid-off, misses
that should help him, short outside off and he latches on early, stands his ground and deposits over midwicket for a boundary
fullish outside off, he chases it, trying to drag it over midwicket, doesn't quite get hold of that but has enough on it to take it to the ropes
pitched up on the off, drives it down towards mid-off
short ball on middle, gently works it down to short fine
pitched up on middle, driven down to mid-on
short outside off and he cashes in, makes for it to turn in a hint, makes room and cracks it between point and cover
pitched up on middle, worked away towards midwicket
quicker through the air on leg stump, tickled behind square for a couple more
turning in from outside off, worked away past leg slip for one more
slowed it down, good length on middle, defended into the off side
tossed up on the off, driven back to the bowler
goes for the slog-sweep, tossed up outside off, tries to smack it over midwicket, misses as it turns away a hint and keeps low
cracks it wide of extra cover and long-off for a couple of runs in the deep
shortish outside off, slapped down to deep cover for a single

tossed it up and vijay accepted the invitation, came down the track, converted it into a full toss and whipped it through midwicket, there is a fielder there but he struck it extremely hard to get it through him to the ropes
flicked away to midwicket again, no runs this time
comes down the track and pushes it to long-on for a single
pushed it into the leg side to midwicket
short outside off, cut away towards deep point for a single
fullish on the off, driven down the ground to long-on for a single
angling it towards middle and off, presents the full face to play it back
taps it towards extra cover off the front foot
flighted on the off, driven straight to extra cover
comes down the track and digs it out to midwicket
swipes that fullish delivery to midwicket again
among his favourite shots, comes down the track and drives it inside out over extra cover for a couple
two more, flighted and he repeats the shot, gets more elevation on it this time, nicely timed but the the result is the same, two
no respite for New Zealand, Gambhir is looking unstoppable, McCullum bowls that wide, short outside off, cuts it away past point and there's no cover in the deep, more fun for India
angling in towards middle, gets back and turns it past midwicket for a single
100 up for India with a faint tickle past square leg
short outside off, turns away, good bounce as well, chopped down to point
pitched up on the off, pushed through the line back to the bowler
angling towards middle, worked away to midwicket
doesn't want to let himself get bogged down, sees some flight and senses a chance, comes down the track, gets to the pitch and launches that onto the shamiana over long-on, big meaty six
angling in towards middle, defended wide of cover for an easy single
pitched up on the off, driven down the ground to long-on
pushed it wide of midwicket for a single
fires it full on the off, pushed it back to the bowler
dropped, short outside off and Vijay played for the turn, it didn't, got an outside edge as he closed the face and Hopkins couldn't snap it, a really difficult chance though
pushed back past the bowler and Brendon McCullum chips in with an acrobatic drive from midwicket
short of a good length on the off, pushed it towards cover
pitched up, eased through the line to long-off for a single
offcutter, short on the off, punched off the back foot to long-on for a single
fullish on leg stump, driven straight to mid-on
angling in towards middle, tapped it past cover for a single
slower one that cut back in, pushed it back to the bowler
went on straight, pushed to midwicket, didn't appear to pick it
flighted on the off, comes down and pads it into the off side
round the stumps, angling down leg, tries to work it square, is hit on the pads
short on the off, turned away, punched past point for a single
short of a good length on middle, dabbed towards midwicket
comes down the track, takes it on the half-volley and drives it to midwicket
fullish on middle, plays it back to the bowler
presses it away through the covers for a single

run-out, Gambhir dabs it into the off side towards short third man, Vijay calls for a single and it turns out to be a mistake, Vettori picks up and throws accurately at the stumps at the striker's end, and scores. Vijay is well short
pitched up on the off stump, defended towards extra cover
full on middle, gets across and drives it past midwicket for a single
tossed up on middle, driven towards midwicket
drives it down the ground to long-on for a single
defended off the front foot towards extra cover
punched off the back foot to deep cover for  a single
on middle and leg, fullish, worked away straight to midwicket
round the wicket and floating it on the pads, tickled past square leg
full on the off, driven through to mid-off
third man is up, full outside off, Kohli plays it cheekily, opens the face slyly and guides it past that fielder inside the circle for a boundary
short of a good length on the off, pushed past point for a single
short of a good length on middle, gets back to turn it away past midwicket
slower one bowled short on middle, opens the face to play it to point
fullish on middle, pushed in front of cover
on middle and off, driven to long-on for a single
full toss on middle, flicked away towards midwicket
fires it down the leg side, tries to tickle it fine but is struclk on the pad
pitched up, makes room and chips it towards long-off for a single
flights it on middle, gets across to work it wide of midwicket for a single
full toss outside off, he had picked his spot, reached forward and swiped it through the vacant midwicket region, there's no one in the deep there and it's four
short of a good lenght on middle, punched back to the bowler
shortish on the off, dabs it in front of point
rocks back and crunches it down the ground to long-off for a single
turned in and kept a little low, walks back and tucks it past midwicket for a single
flighted on the off, defended watchfully towards cover
short outside off, makes room and cracks it towards deep cover for a single
fullish on middle, works it away to midwicket
pitched up on middle, drilled back to the bowler
gets on the back foot and turns it past square leg for a single
short outside off, cuts it past point into the deep for a single
flighted on leg stump, pushed it past midwicket for a single
went straight on, gets on the back foot and punches it to extra cover
slightly short on the off, makes room and mistimes it to extra cover
and again, can't quite get it past extra cover
went on with the arm, gets on the back foot and plays it past point for a single
flighted on the off, pushed down to long-on for a single
short of a good length, punche doff the back foot to cover
slower through the air, bowled slightly short, makes room and cuts it to deep point
tossed up outside off, gets on the front foot and pushed to extra cover
on middle and leg, worked away past midwicket, single taken
short down the leg side, worked away behind square for a single
short on middle and leg, gets on the back foot and works it through square leg for one more, easy consolidation here
worked away off the back foot past square leg for one
flighted on middle, driven down the ground to long-off
Vettori loops it up outside off, worked to square leg
shortish outside off, cut away past point for a single
bowls it short on the off, punched straight to extra cover
flighted outside off, cracked down the ground to long-off for a single
the arm ball, short on the off, dabbed it in front of point for a single
angling in towards middle, defended solidly into the leg side
short of a good length on the off, waits for it and punches it to cover, a packed off-side field in the circle
angling in from round the wicket, opens the face to tap it to short third man
found the gap, as said earlier the field on the off side is packed inside the circle, was short and wide, made a bit of room and cracked it past point to find the boundary
bowls it short on middle, gets back and punches it past midwicket for a single
good length on the off, boos from the crowd as Kohli calmly defends it to cover with his partner just one hit from a century
back of a length and goes for the pull off the last ball, mistimes it to midwicket
just the single and the crowd isn't too happy, cut hard but there is a deep point in place
angling in towards middle, defended towards mid-on
trying to force that off the back foot but doesn't time it well, straight to mid-off
angling in on middle, gets across and works it wristily, but straight to midwicket

gets it past midwicket this time to get a couple, should have just been the single but Kane Williamson tumbled and fumbled, allowing them one more, much to the crowd's annoyance as they have to wait for one more over
short and wide, missed out there, slashed hard, tried to clear point but couldn't connect
opens the face, gets this wide of cover-point, and takes the single
full toss, driven down to long-on for one
clipped away off the pads for a single - one short of hundred now
offcutter on the pads, flicked for one

that's hundred for him! Only the seventh Indian to score hundreds in back-to-back ODIs. It was hit uppishly towards mid-on, but well short, and the misfield allowed him to come for the single. The captain has truly led the way in this series
and Kohli celebrates Gambhir's century with a superb drive through mid-off and extra cover. This could end fast
goes for the big hit, not his best of the day, ends up slicing it over point for two
cut away, but straight to point
and finds point again on the cut
walks down the pitch and plays the old-fashioned slog, mis-hitting it but getting it wide enough of mid-on
tucked away off the pads, but finds midwicket
walks down the pitch and punches it between cover-point and cover
angling into the pads, helped away fine, and a desperate dive from Williamson at long leg saves two runs
almost squeezes it through his defence, Gambhir doesn't move his feet and pokes at it, but the inside edge hits the pad
punched away to extra cover for one
played across the line, finds midwicket
lofted over square leg for four, it's easy now
slower ball, flicked away to midwicket
extra-cover drive, but can't find the gap
steered away to third man for one
hit over mid-off for two - a mis-hit as he looks to pull, but beats the man in the circle
now gets the pull shot right, wide of a flying Williamson at midwicket
they are still diving around - this time at mid-on, saving three runs
pitched up on the off, driven to mid-off
short of a good length on the off, punched towards extra cover
length ball on the off, leans forward and drives it firmly towards mid-on, a slight fumble though it would be harsh to call it that, a single
struck well again, full on the off and it's driven hard down the ground, there is a mid-off in place but he's slightly wide, two more
short of a good length on middle and off, gets across and whips it fine for a single
the slower bouncer and Kohli wants nothing to do with it, was slightly down the leg side and the umpire doesn't spare it, calls it a wide
shortish on the off, gets across and punches it to mid-on
tossed it up, on middle and leg, turned to square leg
short of a good length on middle, gets back and plays it back on the pitch
steps out of the crease, tossed up, comes down the track and lofts him over extra cover for a couple
worked to midwicket
short on middle, gets on the back foot and punches it past midwicket
hurls it short on the off, cracks it straight to midwicket, a mistimed pull
Gambhir wants to finish this quickly, cashes in on a length ball from McKay, the field is in and he launches him over mid-on for a one bounce four
surprised him with the short one, a bit more pacy and some extra bounce to go with it, Gambhir withdrew at the last moment
short outside off, cracked to point off the back foot
short of a good length on the off, rocks back and drops it in front of point
slower one bowled wide, tries to crash him through extra cover, misses
lands on a good length on the off, gets across and turns it to midwicket
fullish on middle, driven wide of midwicket
pitched up on middle and Kohli doesn't let it go to waste, swipes it hard through midwicket, mid-on gives up on the chase, 200 up
short outside off, slowed it up through the air, slapped it to deep cover
worked away off the back foot to short fine leg
arm ball outside off, slightly short, opens the face, runs it short third man

had picked his spot and executed that shot to perfection, there is a yawning gap between deep midwicket and deep square leg, Gambhir stepped out, picked it from a length and just chipped it into the gap, effortless and yields four
short of a good length, punched off the back foot to mid-off
banged in short outside off, backed out of a shot, was tempted to go for it but withdrew at the right time
back of a length on middle, worked to deep square leg for a single
full outside off, steered towards deep point for a single
full on the off, driven straight to mid-off
yorker from round the wicket, on the off stump, it's dug out into the off side
back of a length, crunched off the back foot to deep cover for a single
back of a length on the off, punches it back to the bowler

banged in short on middle, whipped away through square leg into that gap between deep square leg and fine leg, Nathan McCullum dived to his right but scraped against the rope at the point of contact, Kohli raises another half-century, his second in a row and his fourth consecutive fifty-plus score
this is ending soon, length ball and he wastes no time, deposits it with one clean swing over the long-on boundary, actually it just landed on the rope, still six
tries to pull that slower one away, it cuts in to rap him on the arm
short on middle, pulled away to deep square leg for a single
yorker length on the off, is dug out towards cover
short of a good length on the off, punched straight to extra cover
length ball on middle, just pushes it to mid-on
straying down the leg side and gifts India a free run with that wide
all over, pitched up on middle and he picks it up beautifully, launching it over long-on to seal a series win
